children.text: There are a number of ways we can understand what the tuition is. Primarily, we think of education as a service: students choose to go on to higher education to learn skills and acquire knowledge that will be useful in their future professional or personal lives. Then, the tuition is simply how much that education is worth to students.

We’re open to people of all backgrounds and experience levels, so if you finish the bootcamp and complete the assignments you’ll become a full member of the organization. We’d love for you to join us.
